column4: Hello people i'm running linux ubuntu 7.10 and my usernames its bosanac i want to rename it i mean to create another username and to send everything from bosanac to the new username can somebody help me ?

Hello people i'm running linux ubuntu 7.10 and my usernames its bosanac i want to rename it i mean to create another username and to send everything from bosanac to the new username can somebody help me ?
create the new user, sudo cp -R /home/bosanac/* /home/new_user && sudo chown -R new_user:new_user /home/new_user
obviously new_user will be the name of the new user in the commands I just wrote
